# 상상이 현실로…송성문의 빅리그행 ‘버저비터’ - 경향신문

[원문 링크](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiWkFVX3lxTE1pblQ0cVlMcVMwQjJWdWI0UkRGcW02eGJMbk5QbXZMZ0JhZ0xUdk90YlBnbFhjZkdNSVNuV0tHekpoaFdreFliRldpMWxfUUx2TTNKUDExenNEUdIBX0FVX3lxTE1FcVhKWEgtV0x5bEdUUzVUM0lsVUVVWENHNjRFOTFrOHktQ1FlV05VYUpTb1lMZmg1bTJzbTgyUVZHblEweHFDeUNkTmdzV2hxclVqcDY4cjRsT3g3RGVJ?oc=5)
